title: WTB: T206 Matty White Cap, Johnson Pitching and Cobb Red Port PSA/SGC 4-5
author: DeanH3

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Matty White Cap, Johnson Pitching and Cobb Red Port PSA/SGC 4-5
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for a few T206's in PSA/SGC 4-5 grade.

T206 Matty White Cap
T206 Johnson Pitching
T206 Cobb Red Port.

I prefer centering over corners and I'm not particular to any back type. I'm looking for something with really nice eye appeal. Please let me know if you can help. PM me or email me at [url]dean.hackett@surewest.net[/url]. Thanks for looking.

Dean
